en.title: DocShare API
en.text: A RESTful API backend built with PHP & Laravel, designed for high-performance Document Upload, Protection and Sharing.

es.title: BrainPulse
es.text: Una API RESTful construida con PHP & Laravel, diseñada para el procesamiento de datos de alto rendimiento y la gestión de eventos en tiempo real.

fr.title: BrainPulse
fr.text: Un backend API RESTful construit avec PHP & Laravel, conçu pour le traitement de données haute performance et la gestion d'événements en temps réel.

ko.title: BrainPulse
ko.text: PHP & Laravel로 구축된 RESTful API 백엔드로, 고성능 데이터 처리 및 실시간 이벤트 처리용으로 설계되었습니다.

en.title: CourseProMax
en.text: An AI-Powered Course Recommendation Engine for Personalized Learning with adaptive learning pathways, skill-gap analysis, and trending course insights to keep users engaged and motivated.

es.title: CourseProMax
es.text: Una app fintech impulsada por IA que permite procesar pagos, realizar recargas virtuales y gestionar transacciones financieras en múltiples plataformas. Diseñada con seguridad, velocidad y escalabilidad en mente.

fr.title: CourseProMax
fr.text: Une application fintech alimentée par l’IA qui permet un traitement des paiements, des recharges virtuelles et des transactions financières sur plusieurs plateformes. Conçue pour la sécurité, la rapidité et l’évolutivité.

ko.title: CourseProMax
ko.text: AI 기반 핀테크 앱으로, 결제 처리, 가상 충전 및 다양한 플랫폼 간 금융 거래를 원활하게 지원합니다. 보안, 속도 및 확장성을 고려하여 설계되었습니다.

en.title: Mentonixia
en.text: An Compassionate AI for Mental Wellness the premier AI-powered mental health support platform designed for developers, healthcare providers, and wellness applications

es.title: CourseProMax
es.text: Una app fintech impulsada por IA que permite procesar pagos, realizar recargas virtuales y gestionar transacciones financieras en múltiples plataformas. Diseñada con seguridad, velocidad y escalabilidad en mente.

fr.title: CourseProMax
fr.text: Une application fintech alimentée par l’IA qui permet un traitement des paiements, des recharges virtuelles et des transactions financières sur plusieurs plateformes. Conçue pour la sécurité, la rapidité et l’évolutivité.

ko.title: CourseProMax
ko.text: AI 기반 핀테크 앱으로, 결제 처리, 가상 충전 및 다양한 플랫폼 간 금융 거래를 원활하게 지원합니다. 보안, 속도 및 확장성을 고려하여 설계되었습니다.

en.title: AFRIDataNG
en.text: A cross-platform email client built with Flutter, providing efficient communication with an intuitive UI for managing emails.

es.title: AFRIDataNG
es.text: Un cliente de correo electrónico multiplataforma construido con Flutter, que ofrece comunicación eficiente y una interfaz intuitiva para la gestión de correos electrónicos.

fr.title: AFRIDataNG
fr.text: Un client de messagerie multiplateforme construit avec Flutter, offrant une communication efficace et une interface intuitive pour gérer les e-mails.

ko.title: AFRIDataNG
ko.text: Flutter로 구축된 크로스플랫폼 이메일 클라이언트로, 이메일 관리를 위한 직관적인 UI를 통해 효율적인 소통을 제공합니다.

en.title: Remopay
en.text: An AI-powered fintech app that enables seamless payment processing, virtual top-ups, and financial transactions across multiple platforms. Designed with security, speed, and scalability in mind, it makes digital payments smarter and easier.

es.title: Remopay
es.text: Una app fintech impulsada por IA que permite procesar pagos, realizar recargas virtuales y gestionar transacciones financieras en múltiples plataformas. Diseñada con seguridad, velocidad y escalabilidad en mente.

fr.title: Remopay
fr.text: Une application fintech alimentée par l’IA qui permet un traitement des paiements, des recharges virtuelles et des transactions financières sur plusieurs plateformes. Conçue pour la sécurité, la rapidité et l’évolutivité.

ko.title: Remopay
ko.text: AI 기반 핀테크 앱으로, 결제 처리, 가상 충전 및 다양한 플랫폼 간 금융 거래를 원활하게 지원합니다. 보안, 속도 및 확장성을 고려하여 설계되었습니다.

en.title: Remonode BOS
en.text: An AI-powered multimedia SaaS CRM designed for businesses, offering multi-tenancy, smart automation, and a credit-based payment model to scale efficiently.

es.title: Remonode BOS
es.text: Un CRM SaaS multimedia impulsado por IA para empresas, con multitenencia, automatización inteligente y un modelo de pago basado en créditos para escalar eficientemente.

fr.title: Remonode BOS
fr.text: Un CRM SaaS multimédia alimenté par l’IA pour les entreprises, offrant la multilocativité, l’automatisation intelligente et un modèle de paiement basé sur les crédits pour une croissance efficace.

ko.title: Remonode BOS
ko.text: AI 기반 멀티미디어 SaaS CRM으로, 멀티 테넌시, 스마트 자동화 및 크레딧 기반 결제 모델을 통해 효율적으로 확장할 수 있습니다.

en.title: NYP-IP Portal
en.text: A comprehensive digital ecosystem that connects Startups, SMEs, Investors, Funding Bodies, and Government Initiatives. Designed to accelerate industrial innovation, drive skills development, and promote financial inclusion across Nigeria through technology-driven collaboration and data intelligence.

es.title: Impulsando el Futuro Industrial de Nigeria
es.text: Un ecosistema digital integral que conecta a startups, pymes, inversores, organismos de financiación y programas gubernamentales. Diseñado para acelerar la innovación industrial, fomentar el desarrollo de habilidades y promover la inclusión financiera en toda Nigeria.

fr.title: Autonomiser l’Avenir Industriel du Nigeria
fr.text: Une plateforme numérique complète reliant les startups, les PME, les investisseurs, les institutions de financement et les initiatives gouvernementales. Conçue pour stimuler l’innovation industrielle, développer les compétences et renforcer l’inclusion financière au Nigeria.

ko.title: 나이지리아 산업의 미래를 강화하다
ko.text: 이 디지털 플랫폼은 스타트업, 중소기업, 투자자, 자금 기관, 정부 이니셔티브를 연결하여 산업 혁신, 기술 개발, 및 금융 포용을 촉진합니다.

transactions.name: Register Business
transactions.description: Entrepreneurs can create verified business profiles to access support programs, investors, and funding opportunities.

transactions.name: Apply for Funding
transactions.description: Businesses can submit funding requests and connect with investors or government schemes for financial support.

transactions.name: Partner with Government Initiatives
transactions.description: SMEs and startups can join state or federal innovation projects to scale their operations.

transactions.name: Access Training & Skill Programs
transactions.description: Users can enroll in certified training modules aimed at improving industrial and digital skills.

transactions.name: Investment Matching
transactions.description: Investors can explore verified projects, view performance analytics, and fund promising ventures.

en.title: Voot Blog
en.text: A modern AI-driven blog platform built to amplify voices, ideas, and innovations across industries. It empowers creators, professionals, and businesses to publish engaging stories, share knowledge, and connect with a global audience through intelligent content discovery and multilingual support.

es.title: Voot Blog
es.text: Una plataforma de blogs impulsada por IA diseñada para amplificar voces, ideas e innovaciones. Permite a creadores, profesionales y empresas compartir historias inspiradoras y conectar con una audiencia global mediante descubrimiento inteligente de contenido y soporte multilingüe.

fr.title: Voot Blog
fr.text: Une plateforme de blog alimentée par l’IA permettant aux créateurs, professionnels et entreprises de partager des idées, des histoires et des innovations. Elle offre une découverte intelligente du contenu et un support multilingue pour un public mondial.

ko.title: Voot 블로그
ko.text: AI 기반 블로그 플랫폼으로, 창작자, 전문가, 기업이 아이디어와 혁신을 공유하고 전 세계 독자와 소통할 수 있도록 지원합니다. 스마트 콘텐츠 추천과 다국어 지원 기능을 제공합니다.

transactions.name: Create and Publish Posts
transactions.description: Writers and creators can draft, edit, and publish articles using an intuitive, AI-assisted editor.

transactions.name: Engage Readers
transactions.description: Readers can like, comment, and share posts to foster community engagement and discussion.

transactions.name: Multilingual Support
transactions.description: Posts can be automatically translated and localized for readers in multiple languages.

transactions.name: Monetize Your Blog
transactions.description: Creators can enable monetization options, such as ads or premium subscriptions, to generate revenue.

transactions.name: Track Insights
transactions.description: Gain valuable analytics on post performance, audience reach, and engagement trends.

en.title: A.I Powered Millionaire Trivia Game
en.text: An AI-powered trivia experience that challenges players with progressively harder questions — inspired by the classic Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?. The game blends real-time intelligence, voice-driven interaction, and crypto rewards to make learning, competition, and entertainment truly engaging. Players test their knowledge across categories like science, history, technology, and general culture while climbing the virtual millionaire ladder.

es.title: Juego de Trivia Millonario Impulsado por IA
es.text: Una experiencia de trivia impulsada por inteligencia artificial que desafía a los jugadores con preguntas cada vez más difíciles, inspirada en ¿Quién quiere ser millonario?. Combina interacción por voz, análisis en tiempo real y recompensas en criptomonedas para crear una experiencia educativa y divertida.

fr.title: Jeu de Culture Générale Millionnaire Alimenté par l’IA
fr.text: Un jeu de trivia intelligent inspiré de Qui veut gagner des millions ? où les joueurs affrontent des questions de plus en plus difficiles. Grâce à l’IA, à l’interaction vocale et aux récompenses en cryptomonnaie, chaque partie devient une aventure de savoir et de stratégie.

ko.title: AI 기반 백만장자 퀴즈 게임
ko.text: AI 기반 퀴즈 게임으로, 점점 더 어려워지는 질문을 통해 지식을 테스트합니다. 실시간 AI 분석과 음성 상호작용, 그리고 암호화폐 보상을 통해 학습과 재미를 동시에 제공합니다.

transactions.name: Start a Trivia Game
transactions.description: Players can start a new game session and answer AI-generated trivia questions across multiple categories.

transactions.name: Use Lifelines
transactions.description: Get assistance through AI-powered lifelines like 50:50, Ask the AI, or Crowd Wisdom.

transactions.name: Earn Crypto Rewards
transactions.description: Win digital tokens or credits for every correct answer and milestone achieved.

transactions.name: Compete on the Leaderboard
transactions.description: Track your performance and climb the global leaderboard to showcase your intelligence and strategy.

transactions.name: Learn While You Play
transactions.description: Each question comes with detailed explanations powered by AI, helping players expand their knowledge base.

en.title: Multivendor ECommerce Platform
en.text: A cutting-edge AI-powered multivendor marketplace that enables businesses and individuals to create stores, list products, and sell online with ease. Featuring real-time analytics, automated product recommendations, and intelligent inventory management, this platform empowers vendors to scale efficiently while giving customers a personalized shopping experience. From digital products to physical goods, every transaction is seamless, secure, and AI-optimized.

es.title: Plataforma de Comercio Electrónico Multivendedor Impulsada por IA
es.text: Una plataforma de comercio electrónico impulsada por IA que permite a empresas y emprendedores crear tiendas, gestionar productos y vender en línea. Con recomendaciones inteligentes, análisis en tiempo real y gestión automatizada de inventario, esta solución transforma la forma en que los vendedores conectan con los compradores.

fr.title: Plateforme eCommerce Multivendeur Alimentée par l’IA
fr.text: Une plateforme eCommerce intelligente permettant aux vendeurs de créer leurs boutiques, gérer les produits et vendre en ligne grâce à la puissance de l’intelligence artificielle. L’IA optimise les ventes, les recommandations produits et la gestion du stock pour offrir une expérience d’achat moderne et personnalisée.

ko.title: AI 기반 멀티벤더 전자상거래 플랫폼
ko.text: AI 기반 멀티벤더 마켓플레이스로, 판매자들이 손쉽게 상점을 만들고 상품을 등록하여 판매할 수 있습니다. 지능형 추천, 실시간 분석, 자동 재고 관리 기능을 통해 판매 효율을 극대화하고 고객에게 개인화된 쇼핑 경험을 제공합니다.

transactions.name: Create a Vendor Store
transactions.description: Vendors can register, create personalized storefronts, and start selling products or services.

transactions.name: List and Manage Products
transactions.description: Add, update, and categorize products with AI-assisted descriptions and pricing optimization.

transactions.name: Process Secure Transactions
transactions.description: Accept payments through multiple gateways with AI-based fraud detection and secure checkout.

transactions.name: Track Orders and Inventory
transactions.description: Monitor real-time order status and inventory levels with intelligent restock alerts.

transactions.name: AI-Driven Recommendations
transactions.description: Provide personalized product suggestions to increase conversions and enhance the buyer journey.

transactions.name: Analyze Sales Performance
transactions.description: Use data-driven insights and AI analytics dashboards to measure store success and forecast demand.

en.title: Adora
en.text: A cross-platform delivery app built with React Native and a Node.js backend, featuring real-time tracking and seamless integration with multiple platforms.

es.title: Adora
es.text: Una app de entregas multiplataforma construida con React Native y un backend de Node.js, con seguimiento en tiempo real e integración perfecta en múltiples plataformas.

fr.title: Adora
fr.text: Une application de livraison multiplateforme construite avec React Native et un backend Node.js, avec suivi en temps réel et intégration fluide sur plusieurs plateformes.

ko.title: Adora
ko.text: React Native와 Node.js 백엔드로 구축된 크로스플랫폼 배송 앱으로, 실시간 추적 및 여러 플랫폼과의 원활한 통합을 제공합니다.
